basics.name: Ksenia Gulyaeva
basics.label: Junior Software Developer
basics.summary:
I am learning to code and applying my skills for personal projects for around 2 years already and want to start a software developer career now.
I've finished a couple of Coursera courses and watched video series on programming fundamentals and now working on personal projects to get more experience, apply the knowledge I have already and to have fun.

location.region: Residence permit for the Netherlands valid till March 2024

work.summary:
The immersive 11-week course on complete stacks composed of HTML & CSS, APIs, SQL, JS/Node (incl. ES6), React, Redux, Security & deployments, Typescript.
Project workflow includes code reviews and quality assessments, standard practices such as TDD, basics of product development, UX design, and domain modeling, working together in teams using tools like VSCode, Git, Github, and Slack
highlights: Over the course I've created and published numerous project in my GitHub account: https://github.com/ksinia/

work.summary: My first programming job in a visual effects studio supporting the needs of internal teams. I had to give it up because of relocation to Amsterdam.
highlights: Created backup/recovery script for corporate files library and visual interface for its configuration in PyQT;
The design and implementation of the VFX render manager interface, was not finished because I had to leave.

work.summary: Before switching to Software Development for years I've worked in procurement. My responsibility was picking a set of goods to sell and communicate with Chinese production about manufacturing them.

courses: Diving into Python, coursework: sockets client-server application using asyncio
Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)
Chinese language internship at Peking University in 2005

publications.name: Planet Parade game for iOS
publications.summary: Mastermind-like video game I've developed using Xamarin framework for C#

publications.name: Planet Parade game for Android
publications.summary: Android port of the iOS game
